description.value:
You send out a ray of colored light streaming toward your enemy, with a magical effect depending on the ray's color. Make a spell attack roll. If you hit, roll [[/r 1d4]]{1d4} to see which beam you cast. If the ray deals damage, that damage is doubled on a critical hit. Any additional traits that apply to a ray are listed in parentheses just after the name of the color.

  1. Red (fire) The ray deals @Damage[30[fire]] damage to the target.
  2. Orange (acid) The ray deals @Damage[40[acid]] damage to the target.
  3. Yellow (electricity) The ray deals @Damage[50[electricity]] damage to the target.
  4. Green (poison) The ray deals @Damage[25[poison]] damage to the target, and the target must succeed at a Fortitude save or be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Enfeebled]{Enfeebled 1} for 1 minute (@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Enfeebled]{Enfeebled 2} on a critical failure).

Heightened (6th) The damage for @Damage[40[fire]]{Red}, @Damage[50[acid]]{Orange}, @Damage[60[electricity]]{Yellow}, and @Damage[35[poison]]{Green} each increase by 10. Roll [[/r 1d8]]{1d8} to determine the ray's color, using the results for 1-4 above and the results for 5-8 below.

  1. Blue The ray has the effect of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Petrify] spell. On a critical hit, the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Clumsy]{Clumsy 1} as long as it's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Slowed] by the flesh to stone effect.
  2. Indigo (emotion, incapacitation, mental) The ray has the effect of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Confusion] spell. On a critical hit, it has the effect of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Warp Mind] instead.
  3. Violet The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Slowed] for 1 minute. It must also succeed at a will save or be teleported 120 feet directly away from you (if there isn't room for it to appear there, it appears in the nearest open space); this is a teleportation effect.
  4. Intense Color The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Dazzled] until the end of your next turn, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Blinded] if your attack roll was a critical hit. Roll again and add the effects of another color (rerolling results of 8).
